"Balloon Artist Challenge": Participants must create a balloon sculpture of their choice within a set time limit, while being judged on creativity, originality, and execution.
"Balloon Balancing Act": Participants must balance a series of balloons on their heads or other parts of their body for as long as possible without dropping them.
"Balloon Pop Competition": Participants must pop as many balloons as they can within a set time limit, while avoiding any obstacles in their path.
"Balloon Decorating Party": Participants are given a plain balloon and must decorate it using various materials such as markers, glitter, and stickers.
"Balloon Decorative Display": Participants are challenged to create a large-scale decorative display using a variety of balloons, streamers, and other decorations.
